General.Name: Indo Rama Synthetics (India) Limited
General.Description: Indo Rama Synthetics (India) Limited manufactures and supplies polyester goods in India, Turkey, Egypt, Bangladesh, Nepal, and internationally. The company offers various polyester products, including polyester staple fiber, polyester filament yarn, draw texturized yarn, fully drawn yarn, and polyester chips. It engages in trading of spun yarn; and power generation. Its products are used in various applications, such as apparel and sportswear, home furnishings and textiles, hygiene and non-woven, and automotive. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Gurugram, India.

0.Name: Mr. Om Prakash Lohia B. Com.
